seo_keywords: Samsung Jet 60 turns off by itself

problems.title: Vacuum Stops / Filter Light Blinking
problems.description: The unit shuts down after a few seconds and the filter icon flashes red.
possible_causes: Micro filter clogged with fine dust
solution_steps: Remove the dust bin and twist off the fine dust mesh.
Wash the micro filter (green/blue sponge) and dry for 24h.
If the filter is old, washing won't help; it restricts airflow too much.

problems.title: Battery Dies Too Quickly
problems.description: Runtime is less than 5 minutes on Max mode.
solution_steps: Buy a spare battery to double your runtime.
